page.title: 14RAILWAYS
page.content: The Broads Line runs through Antingham and the nearest station is at Gunton. This line runs between Sheringham and Norwich and the stations in between are-Salhouse,Wroxham,Worstead,North Walsham,Gunton,Cromer,West Runton. Every day there are 13 trains between North Walsham and Cromer.The fare is 45p children and 90padults or if you are over 15.The journey lasts about 20 minutes each way. The earliest train is at 6.34am and the latest is 10.05pm. In the summer there are 2 trains extra each way on Saturdays. Some people go to Norwich on the train to watch Norwich City play. Trains going from North Walsham are normally 2 cariages long and there is an engine at each end because it is a single track and the train can't turn round.
